sections.heading: Minor not domiciled in the stateIf the minor is not domiciled in the state, a petition for the appointment of a tutor may be filed in any parish where:(1) Immovable property of the minor is situated; or(2) Movable property of the minor is situated, if he owns no immovable property in the state
sections.text: Minor not domiciled in the stateIf the minor is not domiciled in the state, a petition for the appointment of a tutor may be filed in any parish where:(1) Immovable property of the minor is situated; or(2) Movable property of the minor is situated, if he owns no immovable property in the state.
